      static java.lang.String addImagePath(java.lang.String path)
      the given path
      - might be a file path or an url (http/https)
      - if file path relative: make absolute path based on current working directory
      - is first removed from the list
      - and then added to the end of the list (file path: if it exists)

      - and then added to the end of the list (file path: if it exists)

        public ImageLocator()

    • Method Detail

      • getImagePath

        public static java.lang.String[] getImagePath()
        list entries might be a file path or an url (http/https)
        list[0] current bundlepath (Settings.BundlePath) (might be null)
        list[1:n] path's from -DSIKULI_IMAGE_PATH=...
        list[n+1:] path's added later
        each path is contained only once
        each contained file path existed at the time it was added
        Returns:
        list of absolute path strings (a path might not exist any more)

      • addImagePath

        public static java.lang.String addImagePath(java.lang.String path)
        the given path
        - might be a file path or an url (http/https)
        - if file path relative: make absolute path based on current working directory
        - is first removed from the list
        - and then added to the end of the list (file path: if it exists)
        Parameters:
        path - absolute or relative path or url
        might be a path list string with seperator : (or ; Windows)

      • addImagePath

        public static java.lang.String addImagePath(java.lang.String[] pl)
        the given paths
        - might be a file path or an url (http/https)
        - if file path relative: make absolute path based on current working directory
        - are removed from the list
        - and then added to the end of the list (file path: if it exists)
        Parameters:
        path - absolute or relative paths or urls as string array

      • removeImagePath

        public static void removeImagePath(java.lang.String path)
        the given path(s)
        - might be a file path or an url (http/https)
        - if file path relative: make absolute path based on current working directory
        - is/are removed from the list
        Parameters:
        path - absolute or relative path(s) or url(s) might be a path list string with seperator : (or ; Windows)

      • removeImagePath

        public static void removeImagePath(java.lang.String[] pl)
        the given path(s)
        - might be a file path or an url (http/https)
        - if file path relative: make absolute path based on current working directory
        - is/are removed from the list
        Parameters:
        path - absolute or relative path(s) or url(s) as string array

      • resetImagePath

        public static void resetImagePath(java.lang.String path)
        the current list is emptied (preserving list[0] = bundlepath)
        then add -DSIKULI_IMAGE_PATH=... and Env(SIKULI_IMAGE_PATH)
        then the given path(s) are added using addImagePath()
        Parameters:
        path - absolute or relative path(s) or url(s) might be a path list string with seperator : (or ; Windows)

      • resetImagePath

        public static void resetImagePath(java.lang.String[] pl)
        the current list is emptied (preserving list[0] = bundlepath)
        then add -DSIKULI_IMAGE_PATH=... and Env(SIKULI_IMAGE_PATH)
        then the given path(s) are added using addImagePath()
        Parameters:
        path - absolute or relative path(s) or url(s) as string array

      • setBundlePath

        public static void setBundlePath(java.lang.String bundlePath)
        the given path is added to the list replacing the first entry and Settings.BundlePath is replaced as well
        Parameters:
        bundlePath - a path string relative, absolute, empty or null

      • locate

        public static java.lang.String locate(java.lang.String filename)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        find the file in the following order:
        1. absolute path or url x)
        2. bundle path
        3. ENV[SIKULI_IMAGE_PATH]
        4. Java -DSIKULI_IMAGE_PATH
        5. paths added later using addImagePath or via import ... .sikuli
        Parameters:
        filename - relative, absolute or url
        Returns:
        absolute path string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if filename cannot be located
        x) files behind urls are loaded to local cash

      • getImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage(java.lang.String filename)
        tries to find the file using locate(filename) and loads it as image if possible
        Parameters:
        filename -
        Returns:
        image
